front.title: American National Standard Methods of Measurement of the Electromagnetic and Operational Compatibility of Unlicensed Personal Communications Services (UPCS) Devices

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Specific test procedures for verifying the compliance of unlicensed personal communications services (UPCS) devices (including wideband voice and data devices) are established including applicable regulatory requirements regarding radio-frequency emission levels and spectrum access procedures.
